Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.controller

Class MerchantController

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.controller.MerchantController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/merchants") public class MerchantController extends Object
REST controller for managing Merchant entities.

Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on merchant resources using MerchantService to interact with the data layer.

  • GET /api/merchants - Retrieves a list of all merchants.
  • GET /api/merchants/{merchantId} - Retrieves a specific merchant by its ID.
  • GET /api/merchants/mcc/{mcc} - Retrieves a specific merchant by its MCC (Merchant Category Code).
  • POST /api/merchants - Creates a new merchant.
  • PUT /api/merchants/{merchantId} - Updates an existing merchant specified by its ID.
  • DELETE /api/merchants/{merchantId} - Deletes a merchant specified by its ID.
See Also:
  • MerchantService
  • Merchant

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Merchant>> getAll()

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{merchantId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Merchant> getById(@PathVariable Long merchantId)
      Retrieves a specific Merchant by its ID.

      merchantId - The ID of the merchant to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the merchant if found, or a 404 Not Found response if not found.

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{merchantId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Merchant> update(@PathVariable Long merchantId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Merchant merchant)
      Updates an existing Merchant specified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      merchantId - The ID of the merchant to be updated.
      merchant - The merchant data with updates.

      A ResponseEntity containing the updated merchant if successful, or 404 Not Found if the merchant does not exist.
